item.title: Karnataka: Two Newborns Abandoned in Raichur, Govt Urges Safe Adoption
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: After two newborns were found abandoned in Raichur district in the past week—one near a stream and another by a canal—the Department of Women and Child Development has appealed to those unable to care for infants to hand them over safely to government adoption centres.
Both babies were rescued after locals alerted authorities. Officials termed the incidents “inhuman acts” and warned against endangering children’s lives.
